channel.title: David's Blog
channel.description: My personal blog about a statistician masquerading as a full-stack data scientist

item.title: The Perils of "Auto-pilot Data Analysis"
item.dc:creator: David Dai
item.description: Incorporating domain knowledge from subject matter experts is critical for building useful models. As statistician George Box said, *"All models are wrong, but some are useful."* How useful our models are depend on how well we apply domain knowledge to extract the signal from the noise.

item.title: Modeling domain-specific constraints with xgboost
item.dc:creator: David Dai
